name: Firefox rotating favicons
description: Replaces page loading indicators with rotating favicon images in older (XUL) versions of Firefox.
additional_info:
Notes:
  • When page loading status is "Connecting...", favicon becomes semi-transparent.
  • Default icons (shown on websites that doesn't provide them) are hidden after page is loaded (to save space for page title).
repo: https://github.com/8084/firefox-rotating-favicons
